headline: Dow Opens First Cooling Science Studio in Shanghai, Reinforcing Commitment to Electronics Industry
summary: SHANGHAI, CN / ACCESS Newswire / November 24, 2025 /Dow (NYSE:DOW) has announced the official opening of its first Cooling Science Studio, located at the Shanghai Dow Center. As Dow's first collaborative R&D environment dedicated to thermal management, ...
